keyMoments.title: Confronts Franky for Attacking Usopp
keyMoments.description: Luffy recognizes Franky as the one who beat up Usopp and immediately challenges him to a fight, demonstrating his loyalty to his crew members.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's protective nature toward his crew even during their internal conflict over the Going Merry.
keyMoments.quote: So you're the one who beat up Usopp!

keyMoments.title: First Combat with Galley-La Company
keyMoments.description: Luffy is attacked by Paulie using Rope Action technique, marking the first direct combat between him and the Galley-La Company who now view him as a criminal.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the escalating crisis as former potential allies become enemies based on Iceburg's testimony about Robin.

keyMoments.title: Fresh Fire Technique Debut
keyMoments.description: Franky reveals his fire-breathing ability for the first time in the anime, taking in a large amount of air and unleashing a massive flame attack.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Franky's Fresh Fire technique, establishing his signature cyborg combat ability.

keyMoments.title: Proves He's Not a Devil Fruit User
keyMoments.description: Franky jumps into the water and swims to prove he hasn't eaten a Devil Fruit, demonstrating that his abilities come from his cyborg modifications.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the important distinction that Franky's powers come from technology rather than Devil Fruits, making him able to swim.
keyMoments.quote: I haven't eaten a Devil Fruit!

keyMoments.title: Strong Right Technique Debut
keyMoments.description: Franky uses his Strong Right attack for the first time, launching his detachable right arm connected by a chain at Luffy with devastating force.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Franky's Strong Right technique in the anime, showcasing his detachable mechanical limbs.

keyMoments.title: Weapons Left Technique Debut
keyMoments.description: Franky uses his Weapons Left attack, opening his left hand to reveal a gun sight and firing a cannonball at Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Franky's Weapons Left technique in the anime, demonstrating his left arm's long-range offensive capabilities.

abilities.description: Franky takes a deep breath and breathes fire like a flamethrower from his mechanically-modified mouth.
Franky's right forearm detaches from his body, connected by a chain, and can be launched at enemies like a projectile weapon.
Franky's left arm opens to reveal a gun sight and fires explosive cannonballs at rapid pace.

reveals.information: Franky can breathe fire through mechanical modifications to his mouth
Franky's right arm can detach and be used as a chain weapon
Franky's left arm contains a cannon that can fire explosive projectiles
Franky has not eaten a Devil Fruit and can swim

keyMoments.title: Identifies His Attackers
keyMoments.description: Iceburg regains consciousness and identifies Nico Robin and a tall masked man as the ones who shot him before losing consciousness again.
keyMoments.significance: This critical testimony turns Water 7 against the Straw Hat Pirates and sets in motion the events that lead to Robin's departure from the crew.
keyMoments.quote: It was... Nico Robin... and another tall man...

reveals.information: Iceburg identifies Nico Robin as one of his attackers

keyMoments.title: Rallies Against the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: After learning about Iceburg's testimony, Paulie rallies the Galley-La Company to pursue and confront the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Paulie takes a leadership role in pursuing the Straw Hats, demonstrating his loyalty to Iceburg and his position within the Galley-La Company.
keyMoments.quote: The Straw Hats tried to kill Iceburg! We have to find them!

keyMoments.title: Attacks Luffy with Rope Action
keyMoments.description: Paulie uses his Rope Action technique to bind and slam Luffy to the ground, marking the first direct combat between the Galley-La Company and the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Paulie's rope-based combat abilities and his willingness to fight the Straw Hats based on Iceburg's testimony.

abilities.description: Paulie uses ropes to bind and control opponents, slamming them to the ground with great force.

keyMoments.title: Displays Unusual Strength
keyMoments.description: Kaku grabs Franky and slams him to the ground with impressive physical strength that seems unusual for an ordinary shipwright.
keyMoments.significance: Foreshadows Kaku's true identity as a CP9 agent through his display of exceptional combat ability.

keyMoments.title: Engages Luffy in Combat
keyMoments.description: Rob Lucci engages Luffy in a fist fight and knocks him backward with a single hand strike, displaying combat prowess far beyond that of a normal shipwright.
keyMoments.significance: Foreshadows Lucci's true identity as a CP9 agent and one of the arc's main antagonists through his exceptional fighting ability.

keyMoments.title: Witnesses Franky's Cyborg Abilities
keyMoments.description: Nami witnesses Franky's fire-breathing ability and initially assumes he has eaten a Devil Fruit before he proves otherwise by swimming.
keyMoments.significance: Nami's presence provides the audience perspective on Franky's unusual abilities.
keyMoments.quote: He can breathe fire! Is he a Devil Fruit user?

keyMoments.title: Identified as Iceburg's Attacker
keyMoments.description: Iceburg identifies Robin as one of the people who shot him, dramatically changing the situation for the Straw Hat Pirates in Water 7.
keyMoments.significance: This false accusation (Robin was acting under CP9's blackmail) sets in motion Robin's departure from the crew and the major conflict of the Water 7/Enies Lobby arc.

reveals.information: Robin is identified as having participated in the attack on Iceburg
